## Opium

Opium is a sticky substance taken from the seed pods of the opium poppy. It contains morphine, a strong painkiller, and other chemicals. People have used it for thousands of years as medicine, but it can also be misused as a drug.

To get opium, people make small cuts in the poppy pods, and the sticky latex spills out and dries.  It's then scraped off and dried.  Opium is often turned into heroin, a very powerful and dangerous drug.
